actions.text: Committee on Finance ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Finance. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Bentsen. With written report No. 102-289.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 473.

official_title: An original bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to remove the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics from the list of countries ineligible for designation as a beneficiary developing country.

summary.text: Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to remove the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics from the list of countries ineligible for designation as a beneficiary developing country under the Generalized System of Preferences.

titles.title: An original bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to remove the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics from the list of countries ineligible for designation as a beneficiary developing country.
